list.name: Default
list.comment: Added missiles to the podobear.Cleaned u reused methods.

task.summary: Move explosions and missile arrays to the GameController class (get rid of the static variables).
Move big part of the logic from the game loop to Level class.
Move Player class methods to PlayerManager - EnemyManager and AsteroidManager take in their constructor PlayerManager object to work properly, so I make little changes to them.

Try to use plymorphism in EnemyManager class, by adding new Class GameObject wich will be inherited by all enemy objects in the game and in EnemyManager class the lists with enemies will be of type List<GameObject> ufos = new ArrayList<>(); - for example
Slight changes to GameObject and Ufo classes (better reuse of the "father's" code)

MESSAGE.value: Move explosions and missile arrays to the GameController class (get rid of the static variables).
Move big part of the logic from the game loop to Level class.
Move Player class methods to PlayerManager - EnemyManager and AsteroidManager take in their constructor PlayerManager object to work properly, so I make little changes to them.

Try to use plymorphism in EnemyManager class, by adding new Class GameObject wich will be inherited by all enemy objects in the game and in EnemyManager class the lists with enemies will be of type List<GameObject> ufos = new ArrayList<>(); - for example
Slight changes to GameObject and Ufo classes (better reuse of the "father's" code)
Added missiles to the podobear.Cleaned u reused methods.
